meanings.sent1: The multicell organism had many cells working together.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the multicell structure under the microscope.
meanings.sent3: The multicell cake was made of many small cake pieces put together.
meanings.sent4: The multicell building was like a puzzle of different rooms fitting together perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The multicell structure of the sponge made it absorb water easily.

meanings.definition: A living organism composed of multiple cells.
meanings.sent1: The multicell was a tiny creature made up of many cells.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study multicells to understand how different cells work together.
meanings.sent3: The multicell in the pond was like a tiny city bustling with activity.
meanings.sent4: The multicell organism was a masterpiece of nature's engineering.
meanings.sent5: The multicell organism's complexity amazed the researchers.
